organization.fullName: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

identificationModule.briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Jiedu Tongluo Granules for Post-stroke Depression
identificationModule.officialTitle: The Efficacy and Safety of Jiedu Tongluo Granules on Patients With Post-stroke Depression: a Double-blind, Randomized and Placebo-controlled Trial

leadSponsor.name: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

descriptionModule.briefSummary: To explore the efficacy and safety of Jiedu Tongluo granules for post stroke depression. A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial was designed. The treatment group was administered the Jiedu Tongluo granules, while the control group was administered the placebo.

armGroups.label: Jiedu Tongluo granules
armGroups.description: Patients in this group were administered the Jiedu Tongluo granules .

armGroups.label: Placebo
armGroups.description: Patients in this group were administered the placebo .

interventions.name: Jiedu Tongluo granules
interventions.description: Patients in this group were administered the Jiedu Tongluo granules, 3.9mg/bag, 2 times/day for 8 weeks.

interventions.name: Placebo
interventions.description: Patients in this group were administered the placebo, 3.9mg/bag, 2 times/day for 8 weeks.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Change of 17-item Hamilton Depression Scale( HAMD-17) From Baseline
primaryOutcomes.description: Depression symptoms are mainly measured by the 17-item Hamilton Depression Scale (HAMD-17)

primaryOutcomes.measure: Change of Barthel Index (BI) From Baseline
primaryOutcomes.description: The daily activities will be measured using Barthel Index(BI)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change of National Institute of Health stroke scale（NIHSS）From Baseline
secondaryOutcomes.description: Neurological function mainly measured by NIHSS

secondaryOutcomes.measure: The stroke diagnosis and evaluation criteria of Traditional Chinese Medicine（TCM）from baseline
secondaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate patients' syndrome by TCM scale

otherOutcomes.measure: The change of cytokines IL-6、 IL-8 in serum from baseline
otherOutcomes.description: To find the inflammation factors related with post-stroke depression

locations.facility: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences
